column1: Smoque BBQ////Actually it didn't take us long to eat because you want to scarf down these goodies. I ordered the pulled pork sandwich with one side (mac and cheese) and a "taste" of Texas sausage
column2: plus the complimentary cole slaw. The juicy
column3: succulent pork arrived atop a forgettable soft roll
column4: with a choice of Memphis (sweet) or Carolina (vinegar) sauces in small cups.
